sourceDesc.p: The contents of this document are generated from SOSOL.

div.p: [In the name of the holy and life-creating] trinity of the Father, the Son, [and the Holy Spirit, month day, in the n-th] indiction. [To N.N. the most] ... son of N.N. of blessed memory, [from] Aurelius Pisrael son of Paulus ... [originating from the village] Ibion Peteaphi of the Hermopolite (nome). [I acknowledge freely and] of my own will to have leased from your ... [for a period of n years], reckoned from the crops [of the (God willing) incoming n-th] indiction inclusive, the [n arouras] belonging [to you with] the half share of the reservoir ... Translation: A. Benaissa, ZPE 228 (2023) 249
